  window = top,
  frame = stop("frame not supplied"),
  boxes = stop("boxes not supplied"),
  initialValues = NULL,
  labels = stop("labels not supplied"),
  title = NULL,
  ttk = FALSE,
  commands = list()
)

  window = top,
  name = stop("name not supplied"),
  buttons = stop("buttons not supplied"),
  values = NULL,
  initialValue = ..values[1],
  labels = stop("labels not supplied"),
  title = NULL,
  title.color = NULL,
  right.buttons = FALSE,
  command = function() { },
  sticky_title = "w",
  sticky_buttons = "e"
)

  helpSubject = NULL,

  reset = NULL,

  helpPackage = NULL,
  on_help = NULL,

  reset_location = FALSE,
  sticky = "w",
  ok_label = "OK",

  reset_label = "Reset",

tclvalue_lgl(x)

tclvalue_int(x)

tclvalue_chr(x, trim = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

...

tclvalue_chr() passes these parameters to base::trimws().
frame

Tcl/Tk frame object.
str

sring
trim

(logical) If TRUE, function base::trimws() will be applied.
